title: [K-12] Persuasive Strategy Development Workshop for Online Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A classroom enabling group discussions and individual practice in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain three or more persuasive techniques applicable to online instructional design.
Learners will be able to design an experimental study analyzing the effectiveness of persuasive strategies using mixed research methods.
Learners will be able to submit a prototype design plan applying persuasive strategies to real-world educational scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
